summary: I've seen a lot of mods flying around the Nexus giving Lydia different armor, overhauling her appearance, etc.- with this mod, Lydia's steel armor is not intrinsically tied to her very soul.
descriptionHtml:
I've seen a lot of mods flying around the Nexus giving Lydia different armor, overhauling her appearance, etc.- with this mod, Lydia's steel armor is not intrinsically tied to her very soul.

When you first meet her, she will [i]probably [/i]be naked- not sure, haven't tested it. However, this means she will wear any clothing/armor you give her, as well as use any weapons. She's happiest in heavy armor with a sword and shield, but she's your follower; go nuts.

Happy yelling at her for getting you stuck in a door way! Good luck, please endorse it if you like it. This'll be my first mod, I'm hoping to maybe make a few more.
author: Roseofchaos
